title: Berlin Alexanderplatz Pt VII ( Remember - An Oath Can Be Amputated)

sources.title: Berlin Alexanderplatz Pt VII ( Remember - An Oath Can Be Amputated)
sources.description: Franz has survived the car accident, but his right arm has been amputated. He recuperates for a time with Eva and Eva's lover Herbert. Herbert agitates against Pums's syndicate, so the boss decides to take up a collection to help with Franz's medical costs. Franz goes to a red light district and encounters a pimp who offers him a woman he calls the whore of Babylon.
